guide.title: Presentation Listing
guide.abstract: A list of available Gentoo presentations.

body.p: If you know of a Gentoo presentation that's up to date (as much as possible), please pass it to Sven Vermeulen for inclusion on this page.

Beware, some of the presentations are available under certain conditions. These are mentioned in the License column. Don't use the presentation before reading the License and/or contacting the main author.
